name: Kpop puzzle break
description:
Hey Kpop lovers, there's a new brand game perfectly match your hobby: Kpop puzzle break - a special game mix of Kpop puzzles and brick breaker!
The game play is simple and addict.Puzzles with cover bricks will appear and keep moving down. Your mission is aim and shoot the ball to break those bricks
When you break enough bricks, the puzzle will be reveal. And that's the time for you to prove your knowledge about Kpop - answer the puzzle question to keep playing.
The game will be over when puzzles reach the ground, or when you answer wrong. Lets see how far could your go, friend :)
